blogs.title: Why do we need Qwik JS?
blogs.excerpt: Why Qwik JS? Because the web deserves to be fast, lazy, and unapologetically smart. While the other JS frameworks are busy hydrating like they’re in a desert, Qwik just shows up, resumes where it left off, and drops the mic. Welcome to the era of resumability — your JavaScript can finally chill... until it's actually needed.
blogs.author: Soumya Deep Sarkar
